title: Heads 'n' Tails (Captioned)
creator_credit: Jane Oehr, Kay Francis and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
brief_description: A program that depicts the inter action between a group of teenagers coping with the pressures of growing up in an urban environment. An educational and entertaining video with a sequel called “On The Loose”.
creator_credit_for_label: Jane Oehr, Kay Francis and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
